SELECT ROUND(SUM(memory_size_in_total)/1.name: hanadb_column_tables_used_memory
SELECT ROUND(SUM(memory_size_in_total)/1.description: Column tables total memory used in MB

SELECT schema_name, ROUND(SUM(memory_siz.name: hanadb_schema_used_memory
SELECT schema_name, ROUND(SUM(memory_siz.description: Total used memory by schema in MB

SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP) TIMESTAMP, HOST, M.name: hanadb_cpu_user
SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP) TIMESTAMP, HOST, M.description: Percentage of CPU time spent by HANA DB in user space, over the last minute (in seconds)

SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP) TIMESTAMP, HOST, M.name: hanadb_cpu_system
SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP) TIMESTAMP, HOST, M.description: Percentage of CPU time spent by HANA DB in Kernel space, over the last minute (in seconds)

SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP) TIMESTAMP, HOST, M.name: hanadb_cpu_waitio
SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP) TIMESTAMP, HOST, M.description: Percentage of CPU time spent by HANA DB in IO mode, over the last minute (in seconds)

SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP) TIMESTAMP, HOST, M.name: hanadb_cpu_busy
SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP) TIMESTAMP, HOST, M.description: Percentage of CPU time spent by HANA DB, over the last minute (in seconds)

SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP) TIMESTAMP, HOST, M.name: hanadb_cpu_idle
SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP) TIMESTAMP, HOST, M.description: Percentage of CPU time not spent by HANA DB, over the last minute (in seconds)

SELECT MAX(timestamp) timestamp, host, m.name: hanadb_network_receive_rate_kb_per
SELECT MAX(timestamp) timestamp, host, m.description: Network received rate in kilobytes per seconds

SELECT MAX(timestamp) timestamp, host, m.name: hanadb_network_transmission_rate_kb_per
SELECT MAX(timestamp) timestamp, host, m.description: Network transmission rate in kilobytes per seconds

SELECT MAX(timestamp) timestamp, host, m.name: hanadb_network_receive_requests_per
SELECT MAX(timestamp) timestamp, host, m.description: Network receive rate in requests (packets) per seconds

SELECT MAX(timestamp) timestamp, host, m.name: hanadb_network_transmission_rate_requests_per
SELECT MAX(timestamp) timestamp, host, m.description: Network transmission rate in requests (packets) per seconds

SELECT MAX(timestamp) timestamp, host, m.name: hanadb_network_receive_rate_errors_per
SELECT MAX(timestamp) timestamp, host, m.description: Network receive rate of errors per seconds

SELECT MAX(timestamp) timestamp, host, m.name: hanadb_network_transmission_rate_errors_per
SELECT MAX(timestamp) timestamp, host, m.description: Network tramission rate of errors per seconds

SELECT host, LPAD(port,5) port, file_nam.name: hanadb_disk_data_files_used_size
SELECT host, LPAD(port,5) port, file_nam.description: Used space per file and file type (in MB)

SELECT host, LPAD(port,5) port, file_nam.name: hanadb_disk_data_files_total_size
SELECT host, LPAD(port,5) port, file_nam.description: Total space per file and file type (in MB)

SELECT host, LPAD(port,5) port, file_nam.name: hanadb_disk_data_files_available_size
SELECT host, LPAD(port,5) port, file_nam.description: Available space per file and file type (in MB)

SELECT host, LPAD(port,5) port, file_nam.name: hanadb_disk_data_files_fragmentation
SELECT host, LPAD(port,5) port, file_nam.description: Percentage of unused space compared to total space in file

SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.name: hanadb_disk_total_data_volume_size
SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.description: Total disk size used for DATA files (in MB)

SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.name: hanadb_disk_total_log_volume_size
SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.description: Total disk size used for LOG files (in MB)

SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.name: hanadb_disk_total_data_backup_size
SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.description: Total disk size used for DATA files backup (in MB)

SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.name: hanadb_disk_total_log_backup_size
SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.description: Total disk size used for LOG files backup (in MB)

SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.name: hanadb_disk_total_trace_volume_size
SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.description: Total disk size used for Trace files (in MB)

SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.name: hanadb_disk_total_catalog_backup_size
SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.description: Total disk size used for catalog backup files (in MB)

SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.name: hanadb_disk_total_rootkey_backup_size
SELECT TO_DECIMAL(SUM(MAP(usage_type, 'D.description: Total disk size used for rootkey backup files (in MB)

SELECT host, disk, queue_length, srv_ms.name: hanadb_disk_io_queue_length
SELECT host, disk, queue_length, srv_ms.description: I/O queue length (number of queued requests)

SELECT host, disk, queue_length, srv_ms.name: hanadb_disk_io_latency
SELECT host, disk, queue_length, srv_ms.description: Total I/O latency (ms), calculated from the sum of service and wait time

SELECT m.host, LPAD(m.port, 5) port, m.s.name: hanadb_memory_total_used
SELECT m.host, LPAD(m.port, 5) port, m.s.description: Total memory used per services in MB

SELECT m.host, LPAD(m.port, 5) port, m.s.name: hanadb_memory_physical_total
SELECT m.host, LPAD(m.port, 5) port, m.s.description: Total Physical/resident memory size (operating system perspective) per service in MB

SELECT m.host, LPAD(m.port, 5) port, m.s.name: hanadb_memory_virtual_total
SELECT m.host, LPAD(m.port, 5) port, m.s.description: Total Virtual memory size (operating system perspective) per service in MB
